DLH Corporation

DLH delivers improved health and national security readiness solutions for federal programs through science research and development, systems engineering and integration, and digital transformation. With over 3,200 employees dedicated to the idea that “Your Mission is Our Passion,” DLH brings a unique combination of government sector experience, proven methodology, and unwavering commitment to innovation to improve the lives of millions.

Remote, Atlanta, GA, Bethesda and Baltimore, MD, Charleston, SC, Durham, NC, Norfolk, VA

We're a group of obsessed engineers and developers living at the bleeding edge of technology and security. REDLattice is an agile, mission-focused provider of solutions serving the Fortune 500 and government marketplace. Our expertise is cyber research and development, machine learning, open source architechtures, and unique logisitics challenges.

Builders FirstSource is the nation’s largest supplier of structural building products, value-added components and services to the professional market for new residential construction and repair and remodeling. Our focus is on providing unparalleled service to both large and small customers. Through investments in innovation and an unmatched portfolio of value-added products and manufacturing capabilities, we’re revolutionizing the homebuilding industry – outperforming today and transforming tomorrow.

We have over 600 locations in 42 states

Dental Care Alliance’s mission is to advance the practice of dentistry by partnering with and supporting dental professionals to create a lifetime of healthy smiles. Headquartered in Sarasota, Florida, DCA currently supports over 400 allied practices and supports over 900 dentists across 23 states. DCA’s allied practices represent all dental specialties and treat patients under more than 150 brand names.

Gregory Poole Equipment Company is a family founded, family owned, and family led organization. We care about our employees and communities and have been for over 70 years. Please visit our resources to explore how you align with our mission at Gregory Poole Equipment Company.

Gregory Poole has locations across our territory in Eastern NC, Eastern SC and all of Virginia. There are many full time on site roles, and some Mobile, and Hybrid work roles.

The City of San Diego

With its great weather, miles of sandy beaches, and major attractions, San Diego draws people from all over the world and is home to more than 1.4 million residents. The City is truly a world-class city for all and it continues to grow and prosper through the diverse knowledge and experiences of its community members. The City maintains a competitive merit system for hiring and promotions that provides equal employment opportunity for all applicants and employees. The City strives to have its workforce reflect the vibrancy and diversity of the community it serves. If you would like to be part of an inclusive team of public servants, bring your talents to the City of San Diego.

San Diego, California

ST Engineering North America

ST Engineering is a global technology, defense and engineering group with a diverse portfolio of businesses across the aerospace, smart city, defense and public security segments. With our U.S. headquarters based in Alexandria, VA, we have major operations in over 50 cities across 23 states, employing about 7,000 people in the country. At ST Engineering, are the larges Maintenance Repair and Overhaul company of commercial aircraft in the U.S.

State of Arizona

As a State of Arizona employee, you can choose from more than 1,700 types of career opportunities, all with the same employer, making job mobility and career advancement easy. A great benefit of working for the State of Arizona is a fantastic work/life balance. State employees enjoy challenging work, popular remote work options, comprehensive health and wellness benefits, and career growth opportunities.

Job locations range throughout the Sate of Arizona including opportunities to work remote. Currently over 40% of the State's Workforce participate in our remote work program at least two days a week.

The State of Arizona is a Veteran Supportive Employer, and we value employing military veterans for their unique skills and training. The State of Arizona is proud to partner with our nation’s military as a DOD SkillBridge Partner.Through SkillBridge, the State of Arizona connects transitioning service members with our 100+ agencies, boards and commissions to find rewarding career opportunities where they may continue to serve Arizona and its communities.

https://hr.az.gov/veterans

Sonepar is the Global Market Leader in Electrical Distribution and Solutions. We are a Businees to Business distributor of electrical, industrial, safety products and related solutions with over 490 locations across the United States.

Auburn-WA, Denver-CO, San Diego-CA, Fullerton-CA, Brockton-MA, Chaleston-SC, Cinncinnati-OH, Cranbury-NJ, Jonesboro-AR, Katy-TX, La Vergne-TN, Las Vegas-NV, Milwaukee-WI, Minneapolis-MN, Nashville-TN, Oceanside-CA, Phoenix-AZ, Portland-OR, Salt Lake City-UT, Upper Marlboro-MD,

USAA

Our mission started with a promise: A commitment from a group of soldiers who vowed to take care of their own. One century later, our employees continue the legacy – one of service, loyalty, honesty and integrity. Wherever you are in life – a college graduate, a seasoned professional, a veteran or military spouse – you can join our team in making a difference for the members we serve. It's time to see just how far your talents can take you.

San Antonio, TX - Headquarters Phoenix, AZ Colorado Springs, CO Plano, TX Tampa, FL Charlotte, NC Chesapeake, VA *Remote opportunities are minimal*

Hiring Our Heroes Fellowship Programs

At Global Medical Response, our mission is providing care to the world at a moment’s notice. With more than 38,000 caregivers across the country, we live out our mission every day.

As a veteran, military and reserve-friendly company, Global Medical Response and its host of air and ground-based brands have welcomed thousands of team members over the years that have successfully transitioned their military experience serving their country, into a rewarding career serving their communities as pilots, EMTs, paramedics, nurses, mechanics, communication/dispatch members, and more.

We have an integrated mission of protection and financial investigations to ensure the safety and security of our protectees, key locations, and events of national significance. We also protect the integrity of our currency and investigate crimes against the U.S. financial system committed by criminals around the world and in cyberspace.

Fueling Life’s Journeys Since 1958 Headquartered in Knoxville, Tennessee, Pilot Company keeps North America’s drivers moving as one of the leading suppliers of fuel and the largest operator of travel centers with more than 850 locations in the U.S. and Canada.

We have opportunities Nationwide but majority of our corporate roles are in Knoxville, TN. We also have an energy office in Houston, TX and a sales office in Dallas, TX. We have few remote roles.

At Pilot Company, we are excited to offer active-duty service members the opportunity to gain valuable civilian work experience and exposure to industries during their military service through the DoD Skillbridge Program. These programs are designed to enhance your skill sets in preparation for your post-military careers.

Brink's Inc

The Brink’s Company is a leading global provider of cash and valuables management, digital retail solutions, and ATM managed services. Our customers include financial institutions, retailers, government agencies, mints, jewelers and other commercial operations. Our network of operations in 52 countries serves customers in more than 100 countries.

Roles in Richmond, VA and Coppell, TX with some remote roles. Field roles all over the country.

ATI is the largest physical therapy company under one name in the US. From outpatient therapy to sports medicine to employer solutions and more, ATI has the culture and resources to lay the foundation for your career.

Nationwide

Injury Prevention Specialist, Operations Support Specialist

https://careers.atipt.com/

Those with military medical backgrounds may qualify for the Injury Prevention roles. Operation Support Specialists can be trained and are patient facing roles that fit a student vets desire to get experience in healthcare.

Northrop Grumman solves the toughest problems in space, aeronautics, defense and cyberspace to mett the ever evolving needs of our customers worldwide. Our 95,000 employees are Defining Possible every day using science, technology, and engineering to create and deliver advacnced systems, products and services.

VISA

Visa is a world leader in digital payments, facilitating transactions between consumers, merchants, financial institutions and government entities across more than 200 countries and territories. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses and economies to thrive. Visa offers in-demand careers in IT, Cyber Security, Software Engineering, Data Center Operations & Infrastructure, HR, Finance, Client Services, Business Development and many others. We hope you're considering joining Visa, where your military service and unique skills are valued. Here you can drive innovation in the Global Payments industry and your own career growth!

Ashburn, VA; Atlanta, GA; Austin, TX; Highlands Ranch, CO; Foster City, CA; Miami, FL; New York, NY

We also have a VETS employee network group which is shared with our sister company PlayStation.

General Dynamics Mission Systems provides mission critical solutions to those who lead, serve and protect the world we live in. We are a technology integrator and original equipment manufacturer with deep domain expertise in ground, sea, air, space and cyberspace. Our technology and products are often built into platforms and integrated systems to make them smarter. General Dynamics Mission Systems has more than 100 locations worldwide and employs more than 10,000 engineering and technical professionals dedicated to solving the toughest security and technology challenges facing the United States and its partners.

Rocket Mortgage is our flagship business but, we have opportunities within a wide range of organizations & industries! Some opportunities come with dedicated training programs to help those without in-depth experience become well versed and setup for success in their new career!

Cox Enterprises is a global company of 50,000+ diverse and talented employees. Through our major divisions, Cox Communications and Cox Automotive, we lead in the communications and automotive industries. Our widely recognized national brands include Autotrader, Kelley Blue Book, Manheim, and VinSolutions.

Brookhaven National Laboratory

Brookhaven National Laboratory (www.bnl.gov) delivers discovery science and transformative technology to power and secure the nation’s future. Brookhaven Lab is a multidisciplinary laboratory with seven Nobel Prize-winning discoveries, 37 R&D 100 Awards, and more than 70 years of pioneering research. The Lab is primarily supported by the U.S. Department of Energy’s (DOE) Office of Science. Brookhaven Science Associates (BSA) operates and manages the Laboratory for DOE. BSA is a partnership between Battelle and The Research Foundation for the State University of New York on behalf of Stony Brook University.

https://jobs.bnl.gov/search-jobs

Upton (Long Island), New York

http://Brookhaven National Laboratory (www.bnl.gov) delivers discovery science and transformative technology to power and secure the nation’s future. Brookhaven Lab is a multidisciplinary laboratory with seven Nobel Prize-winning discoveries, 37 R&D 100 Awards, and more than 70 years of pioneering research. The Lab is primarily supported by the U.S. Department of Energy’s (DOE) Office of Science. Brookhaven Science Associates (BSA) operates and manages the Laboratory for DOE. BSA is a partnership between Battelle and The Research Foundation for the State University of New York on behalf of Stony Brook University.

USIC

Veterans who join the USIC team consider themselves problem solvers, are confident in their abilities, take pride in public safety, and thrive in a fast-paced, exciting work environment. USIC is the nation's leader in underground utility location and damage prevention. Our mission: to deliver quality, efficient, safe, and innovative solutions to protect our nation's infrastructure and critical assets.

Nationwide - Direct Hire Indiana - Skillbridge Opportunities

Utility Locate Technician - Nationwide Supervisors (Field) - Jacksonville & Greenville, NC HR Generalist - Jacksonville, FL HR, IT, & Finance Rolls - Indianapolis, IN

Competitive Benefits: 100% Paid Training Work Vehicle & Covered Fuel Expenses Laptop, phone & equipment provided 401(K) with company match Bonus opportunities

J.B. Hunt Transport

We're a Fortune 300 company with 500+ locations in North America. We're one of the largest transportation logistics and supply chain firms and are a Gold Level Military Friendly Employer. We have opportunities for transitioning military and college grads in many professional job types.

J.B. Hunt has a presence in most large metro areas, and also many smaller cities in the U.S. We will work with you to find a SkillBridge location that suits your needs and our capacity to host a SkillBridge participant with a high probability for permanent placement.

We look for forward-thinking individuals who are interested in a career with a leader in the transportation logistics and supply chain industry. We will work with you to find the best occupational program to meet your interests, experience and skills. If you go into the Transportation Manager or Brokerage career track, you’ll learn to manage small driver count fleets, ensuring the safe and timely movement of freight, load assignment and best in class customer service. You’ll work with internal and external contacts to ensure the accurate planning, routing, monitoring, and delivery of freight and loads. Maybe your background is in Mechanics or Maintenance Management; we have those programs as well and you’ll be responsible for keeping our fleet operating safely and effectively. Looking for something in Engineering & Technology, Human Resources, Safety, Sales or other Shared Services? We do that too.

https://careers.jbhunt.com/culture-and-programs/military

With our military programs we work with you personally and you won't get lost in a black hole of applications. Email us at SkillBridgeMIT@jbhunt.com and our SkillBridge Program Manager & Military Recruiter, Corey Hendry will connect with you promptly!
